items.sentence: Why don\'t you tell Tom how you really feel?
I intend to buy a gold bracelet for my wife.
I know that Tom might be tempted to do that.
Is there anything you can tell me about Tom?
It was obvious that Tom wanted to kiss Mary.
It was so cold yesterday that I stayed home.
It was such a hot day that we went swimming.
It was uncertain whether he would marry her.
It was unfortunate that it rained yesterday.
Tom picked up his coffee cup and took a sip.
Tom picked up the phone and started talking.
Tom picked up the pieces of shattered glass.
Tom plans to go in spite of the bad weather.
Tom plays the guitar almost as well as Mary.
Tom plays the vibraphone exceptionally well.
Tom explained the rules of the game to Mary.
We\'d be better off not having one of those.
We\'ll be in Boston for another three weeks.
We\'ll be out of here by this time tomorrow.
We\'ll begin the meeting when Tom gets here.
